content: पुत्रकः [पुत्र अनुकंपायां संज्ञायां वा कन् स्वार्थे क वा] {@--1@} A little son or boy, boy, chap, lad (often used as a term of endearment). {@--2@} A doll, puppet; <ls>Ku. 1. 29.</ls> {@--3@} A rogue, cheat. {@--4@} A locust, grass-hopper. {@--5@} A fabulous animal with eight feet (शरभ). {@--6@} Hair. {@--7@} A pitiable person.
